objects.text:
• Premium leather with artistic stitching
• Soft interior with cushioned sole
• Unique bohemian-inspired design

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Handcrafted Boho Leather Sneaker with Decorative Stitching
product_details.description:
• Premium leather construction with intricate decorative patterns
• Unique scalloped design elements and artistic stitching details
• Comfortable cushioned sole with bubble tread pattern
• Soft interior lining for enhanced comfort
• Two-tone cream and tan color scheme
• Durable rust-colored laces with brass eyelets
• Handcrafted bohemian-inspired design
• Perfect blend of style and comfort for casual wear
• Distinctive heel pattern with protective reinforcement
• Flexible sole design for natural movement

banner_details:
This banner features a premium bohemian-style sneaker product, split into two main visual sections: the left side showcases marketing content while the right side displays the detailed product image. The background uses a dual-tone gradient split: warm earthy browns on the left and soft beige tones on the right. The typography is clean and stylish – the title ("heading" object) uses bold white sans-serif fonts, while the subheading ("subheading") and description ("description") use elegant serif and minimal text. The price ("price") is prominently displayed, and a call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta") in dark brown draws attention. The shoe image ("product_image") is highly detailed and front-centered.  

**Color Palette:**  
- Warm Brown: #8B4513  
- Soft Beige: #F7F2E9  
- Light Tan: #E0CDB5  
- Cream: #F5F0E6  
- Deep Coffee: #A67C52  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a uniquely styled shoe with a warm, earthy color palette dominantly featuring shades of beige, caramel, and burnt orange. The primary upper is composed of soft beige (#F5D7A0) and taupe-like tan (#D6B074), creating a smooth neutral base. Rich burnt orange (#B6541D) appears in the laces and accents, bringing a bold contrast. The sole features a gradient of orange-brown (#A6531A) paired with creamy ivory (#FFF0D9) decorative lines that highlight the design. This blend of harmonious warm tones with high-contrast accents makes the shoe stand out. Ideal for an ad banner, the palette evokes warmth, creativity, and originality.
